tool_description: Schedules and coordinates interviews with witnesses, employees, and other relevant parties for incident investigation purposes.

incident_id.description: Unique incident identifier for scheduling interviews

interviewee_names.description: Names of people to be interviewed

interview_types.description: Types of interviews: initial, follow_up, expert, management, witness

urgency_level.description: Urgency level: low, medium, high, critical

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Incident ID must correspond to an existing investigation case.
Array length mismatch: Interviewee names, types, and preferred dates arrays must have equal length.
Invalid interview type: Each type must be one of [initial, follow_up, expert, management, witness].
Invalid date format: All preferred dates must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Invalid urgency level: Must be one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Too many interviews: Maximum 20 interviews can be scheduled in single batch.
Past dates provided: Preferred dates cannot be in the past.
usage: Provide incident_id, interviewee_names, interview_types, preferred_dates arrays, and interviewer_name. All arrays must have matching lengths. Optionally set urgency_level.

interview_ids.description: Unique identifiers for each scheduled interview

next_interview_date.description: Date and time of the next scheduled interview

coordination_required.description: Whether additional scheduling coordination is needed
